title: 1995-02-15, MTV Unplugged, Brooklyn Academy of Music, Brooklyn,
description:
Live
Plugged Up & More (Custom Made DVD)
Live 1994 / 1995 Tour - Various Location

1995-02-15, MTV Unplugged, Brooklyn Academy of Music, Brooklyn, NY

Tracks 1-9 Soundboard (A+ Quality)



1. Operation Spirit
2. Selling The Drama
3. All Over You
4. Beauty Of Grey 
5. T.B.D.
6. I Alone
7. Supernatural
8. Lightning Crashes
9. White, Discussion


Tracks 1-9 MTV Unplugged recorded at The Academy of Music, Brooklyn, New York: 15 February 1995 (Misidentified on the artwork as 19 April 1995)
Tracks 10-14 Various Locations 1994


This silver CD comes from Live's 1994 tour in support their debut album.  I saw them on this tour several times, and they rocked.  The set list itself is a mix of soundboard and audience recordings, and as such the audience tracks (10-14) suffer from some distortion.  That said, the soundboard tracks (1-9) make this disc worth the money I paid for it back then.  I'm in the mood to up some of my long-ago purchased silver CD's... so here you go.  Artwork scans included.

Enjoy, share, trade freely but do not sell!
